name: Do It Later (BauBau)
description:
Welcome to the daily life of a procrastinator. As most of us know, there is no time like the present so why spend it working!

In this game, you'll have certain tasks, which you might like or not. The goal is simple, finish all the tasks in time, or don't, we're all winners.

For controls, you can use the mouse, if you have one plugged in.
